Eric Nyberg 
Cook County State’s Attorney’s Office, 
The Thomas More Society 
View Eric’s full profile. It's free! 
Your colleagues, classmates, and 400 million other professionals are on LinkedIn. 
Summary 
Illinois attorney, admitted to the bar Oct. 2014. Seeking transactional, regulatory, and/or litigation work. 
J.D., John Marshall Law School, 2013; combined 5 years of internship experience in criminal law advocacy, estate planning, real estate transactions, and commercial litigation. 
Experience 
December 2014 
– Present (1 year 8 months) 
Routinely correspond with contractor affiliates to explain contract terms and insurance requirements; presentations to new hires explaining legal and contractual requirements of the company's contracts. 
Help draft templates of new new contracts and work orders with other attorney team members for upper management. 
Generate Excel pivot tables and weekly reports, monitoring Compliance team numbers and affiliate statuses. 
Drove annual team numbe

generic (juh-NEHR-ik) adjective

1. Of or pertaining to a genus.

2. Sold without a brand name.

3. Relating to a whole group or class.

[From French generique, from Latin gener-, genus kind, class.]

"The Brennans made a commitment to drastically reduce spending and to
begin investing more of their six-figure income for the future. `I even
started buying generic toilet paper that felt like sandpaper to save
money,' admits Kathleen."
Mari McQueen, Making Money Against the Odds, Money (New York) Nov 1998.

Erics may take over the world. We're everywhere... World-famous musician
Eric Clapton, U.S. Army Chief of Staff Gen. Eric Shinseki (he's a living
Gen eric!), South Park's Eric Catman (who has more lives than any cat)...
the list goes on and on.

"There is an Eric Conspiracy," declares Eric S. Raymond, an Internet
developer and writer, who describes himself as an observer-participant
anthropologist in the Internet hacker culture. His research has helped
explain the decentralized open-source model of software development. The
latest Eric/Erik to hit the headlines is Erik Weihenmayer, the blind
mountain climber who scaled Mt. Everest a few weeks ago.

As a guest wordsmith this week, I'll feature five words that end with eric.
You can read my free e-book at http://www.bdb.co.za/shackle/ebook.htm .
This month's edition features a story about AWAD's near half-million
wordlovers. -Eric Shackle (eshackle@ozemail.com.au)

(This week's Guest Wordsmith, Eric Shackle, is a retired journalist who has
written for the New York Times, the Sydney Morning Herald, and the Straits
Times, among others. He is also the copy editor for AWAD, and lives near
Sydney, Australia. -Anu)

............................................................................
Shall I tell you the secret of the true scholar? It is this: every man I
meet is my master in some point, and in that I learn of him. -Ralph Waldo
Emerson, writer and philosopher (1803-1882)

candidates.content: Read the Obituary and view the Guest Book, leave condolences or send flowers. |  Eric Randall Nyberg , 44  Deer River, MN  1967 - February 9, 2012  Eric Randall Nyberg, 44, of Deer River, MN died Thursday, February 9, 2012 at his home.   Eric was born in 1967 to Bruce and
candidates.bestAnswer:
Deer River, MN
1967 - February 9, 2012
Eric Randall Nyberg, 44, of Deer River, MN died Thursday, February 9, 2012 at his home.
Eric was born in 1967 to Bruce and Virginia Nyberg in Robbinsdale, MN. He graduated from Avon High School in Avon, OH in 1985. Eric enlisted in the U.S. Marine Corps in 1985 served in Kuwait during Desert Storm. Following his discharge from active duty in 1993, he continued to serve in U.S. Marine Corps Reserves. He was employed as a machinist at Tru-Stone in St. Cloud, MN and later moved to Deer River, MN. Eric enjoyed cooking, fishing, and most of all being with his family.
He is preceded in death by his father, Bruce Nyberg; maternal grandfather, Carey Wong; paternal grandparents, Phil and Phyllis Nyberg; and uncles, Art Koch and Ken Wong.
Eric is survived by his wife, Christina; daughters, Victoria Nyberg of Melrose, MN, Elizabeth Nyberg of Melrose, MN, and Dana Nyberg of Deer River, MN; his mothers, Virginia (Charlie) Winters of Rice, MN and Betty Nyberg of Monticello, MN; maternal grandmother, Opal Wong of Deer River, MN; sisters, Carrie-Ann Eckert of Minneapolis, MN, Chrissy (Nate) King of Bemidji, MN, Shelly (Brett) Stenstrom of Hibbing, MN, Debbie (Jim) Richert of Clear Lake, MN, and Elissa (John) Janiak of St. Cloud, MN; brothers, Brandon (Annette) Nyberg of Cold Spring, MN, Rob Koch of St. Cloud, MN, Mike (Laurie) Koch of St. Cloud, MN, Cliff (Becky) Morgan of Becker, MN, Jim (Tammy) Morgan of Becker, MN, and Shane Morgan of Milaca, MN; aunts, Luanne Koch of Bemidji, MN and Gail (Lee) Carlson of Sparks, Nevada; and his nieces, nephews and extended family.
Visitation will be Monday, February 13, 2012 from 5:00 P.M. until 8:00 P.M. in Rowe Funeral Home, Grand Rapids, MN. Services will be held Tuesday, February 14, 2012 at 10:00 A.M. in Rowe Funeral Home, Grand Rapids.
Inurnment will take place at a later date at the Minnesota State Veterans Cemetery, Little Falls, MN.
Arrangements are by Rowe Funeral Home and Crematory, Grand Rapids, MN.
Published in the St. Cloud Times on Feb. 13, 2012
Read More
candidates.subject: Eric Randall Nyberg's Obituary on St. Cloud Times

candidates.subject: Attorney Eric A Nyberg | Lawyer in Oakland CA

candidates.content: Eric A. Nyberg Eric A. Nyberg. Managing ... Bendes & Kuhner A Professional Corporation 1970 Broadway, ... top ...
candidates.bestAnswer:
Kornfield, Nyberg, Bendes & Kuhner A Professional Corporation
e.nyberg@kornfieldlaw.com
Oakland native and resident Eric A. Nyberg has practiced bankruptcy, business law, and commercial litigation at Kornfield, Nyberg, Bendes & Kuhner, P.C., since 1987. Among his contributions to the legal community, he has served as a committee member of the Insolvency Law Committee of the Business Law Section of the State Bar of California, Chair of the Bankruptcy and Commercial Law Section of the Alameda County Bar Association, has been a mediator for the Bankruptcy Dispute Resolution Program of the United States Bankruptcy Court for the Northern District of California since the program's inception and is a regular volunteer at bankruptcy clinics sponsored by the Alameda County Bar Association. He is the author of "Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1994," Westland Review's Quick Guide to Foreclosure Law, 1995 Pacific 60, and has been a frequent lecturer on bankruptcy related topics. Mr. Nyberg is a 2006-2015 Northern California Super Lawyer, and has an AV Preeminent rating by Martindale-Hubbell, the national directory of attorneys, indicating outstanding legal ability and very high ethical standards. Outside of his law practice, he is an avid runner, cyclist and enjoys a round of golf. Mr. Nyberg also holds a National Coaching License (soccer).
Year Joined Firm

candidates.content: Vehicle Technologies Office Recognizes Individuals and Teams with Extraordinary Results at 2016 Annual Merit Review At this year’s Annual Merit Review and Peer Evaluation in Washington, DC, the
candidates.bestAnswer:
Vehicle Technologies Office Recognizes Individuals and Teams with Extraordinary Results at 2016 Annual Merit Review
At this year’s Annual Merit Review and Peer Evaluation in Washington, DC, the Department of Energy’s (DOE) Vehicle Technologies Office recognized some of its most outstanding partners involved in research, development, and deployment of sustainable transportation technologies. The Vehicle Technologies Office bestowed Distinguished Achievement and Lifetime Distinguished Achievement awards for teams and individuals that have contributed to projects and programs with extraordinary results.
Eric Nyberg (Pacific Northwest National Laboratory, PNNL) received a Distinguished Achievement Award for his work over the past 10 years on the Magnesium Front End Research and Development Program.  Eric's technical contributions and spirited team building allowed the program to overcome hurdles in a variety of areas and ultimately to deliver validated, lightweight magnesium demonstration structures.
Written by
candidates.subject: Eric Nyberg receives Special Recognition Award from DOE Vehicle Technologies Office

Board Certifications
Why It Matters: Dr. Nyberg's Board Certifications
Board certification should be one of your top considerations when choosing a doctor. Board certification is an official recognition given to doctors who have met specific requirements set by national medical specialty boards in the... More
Why It Matters: Dr. Nyberg's Board Certifications
Board certification should be one of your top considerations when choosing a doctor. Board certification is an official recognition given to doctors who have met specific requirements set by national medical specialty boards in the United States.
Board certification indicates that a doctor is highly qualified in the medical field in which he or she practices. A board-certified doctor is more likely than a non-board-certified doctor to have the most current skills and knowledge about how to treat your medical condition.
Dr. Nyberg is Board Certified in:
Diagnostic Radiology
Accrediting Board: American Board of Radiology *
Neuroradiology
Accrediting Board: American Board of Radiology *
* This information is proprietary data maintained in a copyrighted database compilation owned by the American Board of Medical Specialties. Copyright 2016 American Board of Medical Specialties. All rights reserved.
Healthgrades Recognized Doctor designation identifies leading doctors who:
Are board certified.
Have not had their license surrendered or revoked since Healthgrades started collecting data in 2000.
Have no malpractice judgments, adverse arbitration awards, or monetary settlements for the last five years in the states in which Healthgrades can collect malpractice data.
Are free of state or federal disciplinary actions (sanctions) for the last five years.
Healthgrades updates the Recognized Doctor list quarterly based on board certification data. Healthgrades also receives sanction and malpractice data throughout the year, depending on how frequently the state medical boards release updates.
We remove a newly sanctioned doctor from the Recognized Doctor list as soon as we receive the information. However, it is important to note that malpractice information is publically available in only 14 states.
Media & Publications

ERIC R. NYBERG
ERIC R. NYBERG - DEPARTMENT MANAGER - CARPET, UPHOLSTERY, DRAPERY CLEANING, WATER DAMAGE, MOLD REMEDIATION, 3M WINDOW FILM
BONDED SERVICES CORPORATION
Eric R. Nyberg joined Bonded Services, full time, as an assistant manager in 2005.
He
was promoted to department manager of carpet, upholstery, and drapery cleaning in late 2005, Water Damage and Mold Remediation in 2008, and 3M Window Film in 2009, and currently resides in that position.
Eric graduated from Cathedral Preparatory School in 2001 and attended Penn State Behrend, where
he
studied business management and received a degree in communications.
During
time at Behrend, Eric was involved in many activities including TOPS soccer camp, where
he
taught children with disabilities how to play soccer.
Eric was also a member of the Kappa Delta Rho fraternity.
